CRNC.work Blockchain MOOC!

Aug 30, 2015

Blockchain Background

Other particularly noteworthy resources

Any errors, inconsistencies or failures of the curated content can be blamed upon the individuals behind CRNC.work, but the STRUCTURE or OUTLINE of this MOOC is really solid … because it was blatantly stolen from the Table of Contents of very important book Blockchain(https://www.safaribooksonline.com/library/view/blockchain/9781491920480/) written by the Founder of The Institute for Blockchain Studies, Melanie Swan and published by O’Reilly Publishing. There are other noteworthy resources that are worth following closely as well … for example, the Ledra Capital Mega Master Blockchain List and the full Ledra Bitcoin series are certainly a great starting point and complement to this MOOC. If you are interesting learning more about the blockchain, the best way might be to clone this MOOC and then make it better with your own curated content, notes, observations and updates.
